message: Welcome to our exclusive store! We're thrilled to offer you a unique opportunity to own one of our premium products. With 50% of our products being high-quality, there's a good chance you'll be getting a top-notch item. Our previous customers have been extremely satisfied with their purchases, and we're confident you'll love it too. The price for this product is $1000000, a small price to pay for the potential to own a potentially high-quality item. Will you take the chance and make this product yours?

Since this is the first product, there's no previous sales data to go by. Given the 50/50 odds of it being high quality, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product at $1000000. I'm hoping for the best!
